src:
MU yang Suka Buang-Buang Peluang
03 Nov 2019, 01:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer mengaku kecewa dengan kekalahan timnya di markas Bournemouth. Solskjaer menilai kekalahan ini dikarenakan timnya gagal memanfaatkan peluang dengan baik.
Kemarin malam, Manchester United bertandang ke Vitality Stadium. Mereka menantang Bournemouth untuk pertandingan pekan ke 11 EPL.
Di akhir laga, United harus mengakui keunggulan tuan rumah. Mereka ditumbangkan oleh gol mantan pemain muda mereka, Joshua King di akhir babak pertama.
Solskjaer merasa timnya seharusnya tidak layak kalah di pertandingan tersebut. "Hari ini kami tidak menyelesaikan peluang kami dengan baik," keluh Solskjaer kepada MUTV.

Baca komentar lengkap sang manajer di bawah ini.
text:
MU Who Like Wasting Opportunities
Nov 3 2019, 01:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer admitted he was disappointed with the defeat of his team at Bournemouth headquarters. Solskjaer assess this defeat because his team failed to take advantage of opportunities properly.
Last night, Manchester United visited the Vitality Stadium. They challenge Bournemouth for Week 11 of the EPL match.
At the end of the fight, United must recognize the superiority of the host. They were overthrown by the goal of their former young player, Joshua King at the end of the first half.
Solskjaer felt his team should not deserve to lose in the match. "Today we did not complete our opportunity well," Solskjaer complained to MUTV.

Read the manager's full comment below.
